H0.text: Ash is the component that soil that drains slowly most likely contains in high amounts.

H1.text: Sand is the high amount found in soil that drains slowly.

H2.text: Clay is the component that soil that drains slowly most likely has a high amount of.

H3.text: Peat is the substance most likely found in high amounts in soil that drains slowly.

A4.text: Fine textured soils generally have a higher capacity for water retention

A5.text: sandy soils contain large pore spaces that allow leaching
